exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x : Z, Pell x 0 <-> x = 1 \\/ x = -1" on hypothesis of type "Pell y x".
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

original: intros Hy0 Hx0 H. apply Pell_sym in H. apply Pell_zero_right in H. destruct H as [H | H]. - subst x. contradict Hx0. apply Z.lt_irrefl. - subst x. contradict Hx0. apply Z.lt_irrefl.
